original_title: Inga Tidblad - Lysande stjärna av sin tid
overview: Inga Tidblad started acting in 1921 and became one of Sweden's greatest and most successful actresses of all time. Daughter Meg Westergren, colleagues Bibi Andersson, Helena Bergström, Thommy Berggren and Sven Wollter are a few who talk and remember her as a person and as an actor.
title: Inga Tidblad - Lysande stjärna av sin tid
